3 John__01.4__No greater grace: : that is nothing that gives me greater joy and satisfaction.
3 John__01.7__Taking nothing of the Gentiles: : These ministers of the gospel are commended by St. John, who took nothing from the Gentiles, lest they should seem to preach in order to get money by it.
3 John__01.9__Diotrephes, who loveth: : This man seemeth to be in power, but not a friend to the faithful; therefore this part of the letter might be an admonition to him from the apostle.
